SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member
AND user_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT m.user_id, s.store_name, m.name, TO_CHAR(m.birthday, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS birthday, m.email FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN store s ON m.user_id = s.user_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT store_name, profile_img, introduce, TRUNC(SYSDATE - input_date) as open_days FROM store WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE store_num = (SELECT store_num FROM store WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AND delete_flag = 'N'

SELECT r.review_text, r.review_rate, TO_CHAR(r.review_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as review_date, '구매자' as writer_id FROM review r WHERE r.store_num = (SELECT store_num FROM store WHERE user_id = #{userId}) ORDER BY r.review_date DESC
SELECT user_id, store_name, profile_img, introduce, TO_CHAR(input_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as input_date, TRUNC(SYSDATE - input_date) as open_days FROM store WHERE user_id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_ORDER o JOIN product p ON o.product_num = p.product_num JOIN store s ON p.store_num = s.store_num
AND o.BUYER_ID = #{id} AND s.user_id = #{id} AND o.ORDER_STATUS != 'CANCELED'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT p.product_num, p.title, o.AMOUNT as price, TO_CHAR(o.CREATED_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as trade_date, o.ORDER_STATUS as status_text, s.store_name as target_id o.BUYER_ID as target_id FROM product_ORDER o JOIN product p ON o.product_num = p.product_num JOIN store s ON p.store_num = s.store_num WHERE o.BUYER_ID = #{id} s.user_id = #{id} AND o.ORDER_STATUS != 'CANCELED' ORDER BY o.CREATED_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
